H0.text: Which metal is obtained from the mineral ore haematite. Titanium

H1.text: Which metal is obtained from the mineral ore haematite. Copper

H2.text: Which metal is obtained from the mineral ore haematite. Manganese

H3.text: Which metal is obtained from the mineral ore haematite. IRON

A4.text: Hematite (Fe2O3) is a major ore of iron.
